result.execSummary:
The defendant Heather M Maruna was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Must follow rules of Probation.
Consecutive to: 15CF369 - Count 1

miscConds.notes: May not possess or use firearms or body armor.

If not a US citizen, may face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.
No contact with Joel Bruflodt is subject to the discretion of Probation.
Must provide DNA sample.  No surcharge.

records.addlTxt: Sentencing - January 27, 2016.  Original in 15CF369.

3 CASES:  15CF341, 15CF369, 15CF143  Defendant Heather M Maruna in court with attorney Shelly Tomtschik.  Defendant Heather M Maruna in custody.  Daniel Patrick Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  3:10 JP-clerk    Atty Tomtschick recv'd PSI.  DA-no victims.  DA addresses Ct.  Atty Tomts addresses ct. 


SENTENCING 15CF369 - Ct - count 1 - 2 years 6 months confinement with 2 years extended supervision. Eligible for challenge incarceration.  Elig for sub abuse program.  DNA sample for each count.  DNA surcharge of $250.00.  Court Costs - $290.60.   Follow Compass evaluation.  Follow rules of probation and extended supervision.  No firearm.  Deportation.  85 days sentence credit.  No contact with Joe Bufold, subject to discretion of probation.  Fees to be paid through probation.  Unable to make probation of supervision, fees can be reduced to civil judgment.  



SENTENCING 15CF143 - Ct - withhold sentence prob 3 years on each case and consecutive on sentence of 15CF369.  No DNA surcharge due to indigency. Ct waives court costs.  


SENTENCING 15CF341 - Ct - withhold sentence prob 3 years on each case and consecutive on sentence of 15CF369.  No DNA surcharge due to indigency. Ct waives court costs. 

4:45 adj.
Prisioner to Appear for Court Proceedings
AMENDED

COVERS CASES: 15CF143, 15CF341 & 15CF369.  Not to possess or use drugs or drug paraphernalia.  Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.  Upon release from custody elsewhere within 8 hours of release, must report back to the Polk County Jail.

15CF369-Count 1-amended w/o repeater but 2nd & subsequent offense remains.  Count 1-guilty plea. CT-accepts plea, adj guilty & judgment entered.
All other counts dismissed.  Amended Information to be filed.

No firearms, cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, other civil rights may be lost until restored, no body armor, if not US citizen face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.
